config.file:
<list>
declare variable $doc as node() external;
let $title := data($doc//*[@class="moviename-big"]/text()) let $year := data($doc//*[@class="info"]/tbody/tr[1]/td[2]/div/a) let $country := data($doc//*[@class="info"]/tbody/tr[2]/td[2]/div/a) let $director := data($doc//*[@class="info"]/tbody/tr[4]/td[2]/a) let $writers := data($doc//*[@class="info"]/tbody/tr[5]/td[2]/a) let $genres := data($doc//*[@class="info"]/tbody/tr[11]/td[2]/a) let $buget := data($doc//*[@class="info"]/tbody/tr[12]/td[2]/div) let $acters := data($doc//*[@class="actor_list"]/div/span/a)
return <film> <title>{normalize-space($title)}</title> <year>{normalize-space($year)}</year> <country>{normalize-space($country[1])}</country> <director>{normalize-space($director)}</director> <writers>{normalize-space($writers[1])}</writers> <genres>{normalize-space($genres[1])}</genres> <buget>{normalize-space($buget)}</buget> <acter>{normalize-space($acters[1])}</acter> <acter>{normalize-space($acters[2])}</acter> <acter>{normalize-space($acters[3])}</acter> </film>
</list>
